precision.2: ADM1 = Sub-region (administrative division, state, district, province) level accuracy.
precision.3: ADM2 = Town, city, village, post code/zip level accuracy.
precision.4: Street level (within 5 km of address) accuracy.
precision.5: Longitude/Latitude, exact address, premise building name, property name, shopping center, etc.) level accuracy.

scope.1: Single location: only in one town, city, village, post code/zip
scope.2: Only in one Sub-region: only in oneﾠadministrative division, district, state, or province
scope.3: Multiple sub-regions: spread over multiple sub-regions, but not national in scope
scope.4: National: scaled to the national level ﾠ ﾠ ﾠ ﾠ ﾠ ﾠ
scope.5: Multiple countries: taking place in more than one country
scope.6: Regional: aimed at supporting regional capacity, regional institutions, regardless of where the activities are taking place

type.1: Activity: Refers to a location/area where the project is implemented, a workshop is held, etc.
type.2: Intended Beneficiaries: Refers to a location/area that benefits from the project.
